text: Eréndira Cova Brindis is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2001 to 2003 she served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Tlaxcala. ==References== Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tlaxcala Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Autonomous University of Tlaxcala alumni
title: Eréndira Cova Brindis
